  User Formulas
  Name, Formula
  @begdate, date({?IN_BEGDATE})

  @enddate, date({?IN_ENDDATE})

  @itemcode, if {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.TRANTYPE} = 'AA' or
   {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.TRANTYPE} = 'ZZ'
then
  {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.ITEM}

  @trandesc, if {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.TRANTYPE} = 'AA' then 'Opening Balance' 
else
if {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.TRANTYPE} = 'ZZ' then 'Closing Balance' 
else
if {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.DTLTRANTYPE} = 'AD' then {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.REASON}
else if isnull({ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.REFERENCE}) then
  ToText ({ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.ORDERID},0,'') + '-' + totext ({ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.SHIPID},0)
else
    ToText ({ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.ORDERID},0,'') + '-' + totext ({ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.SHIPID},0) + '/' +
  ToText ({ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.REFERENCE})


  @trandate, if {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.TRANTYPE} = 'AA' then {@begdate} 
else if {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.TRANTYPE} = 'ZZ' then {@enddate} 
else {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.EFFDATE}

  @itemdesc, if {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.TRANTYPE} = 'AA'
then {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.ITEMDESC}
else
if {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.TRANTYPE} = 'DT' then 
    if{ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.DTLTRANTYPE} = 'AD' then 'Adjustment ('+{ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.INVABBR}+')'
        else if {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.DTLTRANTYPE} = 'SH' then 'Shipment ' 
             else if {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.DTLTRANTYPE} = 'RC' then 'Receipt '
                  else if {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.DTLTRANTYPE} = 'RT' then 'Return '

  @conssuppname, if {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.DTLTRANTYPE} in ['SH', 'RC', 'RT'] then {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.CONSIGNEE_OR_SUPPLIER_NAME}
 

  @codedate, if {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.TRANTYPE} = 'AA' or
   {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.TRANTYPE} = 'ZZ'
then
  {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.ADDLINFO}
  @lotnumber, if {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.TRANTYPE} = 'AA' or
   {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.TRANTYPE} = 'ZZ'
then
  {ASOFINVACTLOTPROC.LOTNUMBER}
  
  Parameters
  Name, Description, Data Type
    IN_CUSTID, , String
    IN_FACILITY, , String
    IN_ITEM, , String
    IN_BEGDATE, , DateTime
    IN_ENDDATE, , DateTime
    IN_DEBUG_YN, , String
  
  
  SQL Query
    
BEGIN "ALPS"."DRE_ASOFINVACTLOTPROC"(:AOI_CURSOR, N'CCC', N'107', N'ALL', TO_DATE ('04-12-1941 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE ('07-12-1941 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), N''); END ;
